summary.title: Summary
summary.description: I love to solve complex and creative tasks in every aspects of software engineering, both on Front End and Back End. As I work, I search for the best solution, which can fulfill every needs of the customer, and also the most professional one. I have a high level experience in creating responsive user interfaces, as well as in developing Web APIs. Furthermore, I have gained experience in REST, SOA and FireBase server development.

fun-fact.title: Interesting fact
fun-fact.description: You can see, that I am thoroughly focusing on a task, when I have headphones over my ears and I am only available through Skype, even to the person sitting next to me.

griff.title: Senior Web Developer | September 2019 - Present
griff.description: As a Senior Developer, I was part of many projects, mainly as an Angular and JavaScript expert. I was tasked to help bootstrapping new green-field projects. Also, I had to analyze the performance of an exisitng angularJS application to provide a plan to improve it, and I made major refactoring on it in addition. Currently, I am responsible to design an architecture to enable the modernization of the company's technology stack. Part of this is to plan a Framework for the new projects, but also to enable the migration of existing, legacy projects.

nitro.title: Web Developer | February 2019 - September 2019 (0.5 year)
nitro.description: As a part of a team of 5 person, we created several Angular web applications, during which we were closely cooperated with the Back End developers, occasionally we also worked in a Front End driven manner. During the development of these projects, there was a need to write automated tests, unit and End-To-End as well.

cas-angular.title: Web Developer | April 2016 - February 2019 (3 years)
cas-angular.description: Inside the company, our team was responsible for researching the possibilities of Angular and other Web technologies, as the base of a unique Cross Platform framework and API. During our research, I got to know the Angular platform and its possibilities in depth. Also, as a result of our work, we developed the first version of the API, which we also publicated inside a corporate NPM repository. As part of the development of this API, I also learned the basics of End-To-End testing, which I had to use to test our framework.

cas-NET.title: .NET Developer | April 2014 - April 2016 (2 years)
cas-NET.description: I started working during my Master degree studies, first as a student colleague, in C#. During my work I learned several .NET technologies, initially I developed an ASP.NET web application as a part of a bigger team, following the SCRUM methodology. Then, as a member of an other team, I got to know the basics of Winows 8.1 development, later I took part in the pre-development of a Cross Platform framework, with the use of WPF and UWP technologies.
